src_original: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /

tgt_original: 『以出世智為諸有情啟未開門，皆令悟入。

src_original: sa pithad evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvānāṃ sarvâpāyadvārāṇi pidadhyāṃ /
tgt_original: 』若見關閉，願為有情關閉三有或四惡趣；

src_original: sa niṣīdann evaṃ*cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 若得安坐，願諸有情坐菩提座；

src_original: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān eva parinirvāpayeyaṃ /  sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān vyutthāpayeyaṃ sarvakleśaparyutthānebhyaḥ /  sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 若右脇臥，願諸有情皆證圓寂；

src_original: sarvasatvā mahāpuruṣagatyā gacchantu /  sa tatrôpaviṣṭae evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvā niḥśalyakriyā yad uta rāgadveṣamohebhyaḥ /  sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 從坐臥起，願諸有情離諸起惑；

src_original: yathā kathitaṃ câryaratnameghe /  sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalâpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 若見如來制多形像，即持種種香華供養，願有情類離破戒香，得淨戒香猶如諸佛；

src_original: sa sanmārjanôpalepanaṃ kurvan sarvasatvānām aprāsādikêryāpathavigamāya /  prāsādikêryāpathasaṃpade ca pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 掃灑塗地，願諸有情威儀齊整；

src_original: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 花蓋覆罩，願諸有情皆離熱惱；

src_original: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān nirvāṇapuraṃ praveśayeyaṃ /  sa niṣkramann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān saṃsāracārakān niṣkrāmayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 入僧住處，願諸有情皆入圓寂； 出僧住處，願諸有情皆出魔境；
